MAX_LAND_RENT_PRICE_OBSD:0.00000331,// minimum building level to be placed to a land

2.237],// control values
ENABLE_WORKER_UPGRADES:true,ENABLE_RENT_EXTERNAL_LANDS:true,ENABLE_RENEW_RENT_LANDS:true,ENABLE_REST_SKILLED_WORKERS:true,ENABLE_REST_UNSKILLED_WORKERS:true,ENABLE_SHIFT_SKILLED_WORKERS:true,ENABLE_SHIFT_UNSKILLED_WORKERS:true,BUSY_SKILLED_WORKERS_AMOUNT:{Space:40,Time:40,Water:40,Light:40,Earth:40,Shadow:40}};var currentEconomyValues=_.cloneDeep(ECONOMY_VALUES);var setEconomyValues=function setEconomyValues(_ref){var economyValues=_ref.economyValues;currentEconomyValues=_.cloneDeep(economyValues);};var getEconomyValues=function getEconomyValues(){return _.cloneDeep(currentEconomyValues);};module.exports={setEconomyValues:setEconomyValues,getEconomyValues:getEconomyValues,ECONOMY_VALUES:ECONOMY_VALUES};
